attributes.action: Not cancel Local Council Election in May 2025.
attributes.additional_details: Cancelling local elections is undemocratic. We need less devolution, not more of it. It has a feeling of a dictatorship about it.
attributes.background: To hold Local Council elections, as planned, in May 2025 and not alter council boundaries or give further devolved powers to local councils or other UK Nations

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
